metadata.title: CVE-2025-1215 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in vim up to 9.1.1096.This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file src/main.c. Themanipulation of the argument --log leads to memory corruption. It ispossible to launch the attack on the local host. Upgrading to version9.1.1097 is able to address this issue. The patch is identified asc5654b84480822817bb7b69ebc97c174c91185e9. It is recommended to upgrade theaffected component.

criterions.comment: vim package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
